note.p: Miller. Son of Richard Dixon of Hartford End Mill and his first wife, Elizabeth Boyden. Married firstly Charlotte Morris (1761/2–97) at St Lawrence Jewry, London, in 1787; secondly Ann Walker (who predeceased him) at St Gregory’s, Norwich, in 1799.
